summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding the handling and production of Epstein-related materials, specifically UBS returns. It discusses checking and uploading files from a disc, indicating ongoing document management for legal proceedings.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting the upload and verification of UBS return documents from a disc, and coordinating the production of materials.

events.title: Email coordination on UBS returns production
events.description: Email exchange regarding the need to upload and verify UBS return documents related to the Epstein case that were received during the pandemic and may not have been previously uploaded.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 2, 2020, concerning the management of Epstein case materials.
It references UBS returns that were received during the COVID-19 pandemic and may not have been uploaded to the shared system.
Specific folders ('07.07' and '07.08') on a disc are mentioned, with instructions to check and upload any missing materials for legal production.
